newsitem.title: USA: Sybase outsources Gain Momentum product.
newsitem.headline: Sybase outsources Gain Momentum product.

text.p: Sybase Inc said Wednesday it has decided to outsource its Gain Momentum product to Triton Services Inc as part of a broader move to focus on its core technology.

Triton will now provide sales, support, maintenance and continued product enhancement for the product. Sybase will discontinue distribution of Gain Momentum, which was formerly sold by Sybase's New Media unit.

In 1991, Sybase acquired Gain Momentum, an interactive environment for building and deploying multimedia applications. Sybase said that with the growth of the Internet and intranet, Gain Momentum no longer plays a major role in it's future plans.
Privately-held Triton is a value-added reseller of Sybase products and has been working with existing Sybase products since 1990.
